author: PlayStation
description: Get ready to watch the grand final of the EA SPORTS FC 25 Creators Cup, live from Madrid! 12 talents from all over the world and 12 players who have qualified through the PlayStation Tournaments platform on PS5 will participate in the grand final. Who will be crowned this year’s champion? Incredible prizes are up for grabs, such as tickets to the UEFA Champions League final in Munich.
title: EA SPORTS FC 25 Creator’s Cup | PlayStation Esports

title: MLB The Show 25 - Diamond Dynasty Co-op | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008217

The Alters is an ambitious sci-fi survival game created by the team who brought the award winning game This War of Mine. The Alters got a unique twist: you play as Jan Dolski, the lone survivor of a crash-landed expedition on a hostile planet. To survive, you must form a new crew for your mobile base. Using a substance called Rapidium, you create alternative versions of Jan—THE ALTERS—each one shaped by a different crucial decision from the protagonist’s past.

Long story short, if you played This War of Mine, The Alters is a must-try.

#ps5 #ps5games #thealters
title: The Alters - If you played This War of Mine, The Alters is a must-try | PS5 Games

Save the harmony tree, tend to your farm, run your shop and look after animals in this classic, cozy, comfortable little farming game at your own pace, with no timers, no threats and no pressure.

#ps5 #ps5games #pcgames #sugardewisland
title: Sugardew Island - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
WISHLIST NOW: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10014540

Missing Banban is coming to Playstation in 2025:

Life is always easier with friends. But what if one of them goes missing? Grab your weapon and jump, shoot and dodge in this action-packed side-scroller adventure. Fight your way through enemies to find your lost friend in this twisted world!

Your friend went missing, and a dark force is looming in this already deranged world. You, Sheriff Toadster, are the only toad that can save him in this intense action-packed side-scroller adventure! Jump around, shoot your way through and investigate the mysterious disappearance, all while exploring the land and meeting the intriguing characters of this universe!

Features:
BEWARE OF TRAPS - avoid dangers and move with precision to get through the obstacles in your path.
DON’T STAND STILL - dash, climb walls and jump to conquer this challenging realm.
AROUND THE WORLD, AROUND THE WORLD - roam through beaches, forests, secret fa
title: Missing Banban - Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

description:

- "Get out!" is an original game derived from the "Very Bad Dreams" Franchise released on PSVR2
- Playing a difficult patient locked in a strange mental asylum and experience a day like no other!
- Maybe the craziest VR Horror game ever...
- Exclusively developed for the PSVR2 with well-worked haptic capabilities (B-Haptics compatible).

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games 

Rated Mature
title: Get Out! - Announcement Teaser Trailer I PS VR2 Games
